name: Tromos
description:
CONTROLS (Keyboard / Keypad)
============================
Move: Cursor keys or WASD / Left Stick
Attack: Left Ctrl / A
Block: Left Alt / B or Right Trigger
Interact: Left Shift / X or Y
Restart: R / Start

YOUR GOAL
=========
Find the artifact to unlock parts of the map, then kill the Hydra.
You can attack while keep holding block. Your character will strike out from behind your shield.
You cannot use your shield when you are using a bow.
